description:
GDG Porto in the philosophy of sharing knowledge on Porto decided to partner with PTM in their first conf.

Porto Testers Meetup (PTM) is a group of friends that decided to contribute to the community by starting to organize events where we could gather everyone interested in all the topics regarding testing.
PTM Conf is a one day event dedicated to Testing and all the related topics like CI/CD, TDD, BDD, Gherkin, Test Management, DDT and even Virtual and Augmented Reality testing

Disclaimer:
The tickets WON'T be reserved here, please go to:
https://ptmconf.com/
name: PTM Conf 2018
